alert.note: Alert for Arthur; Grant; Hooker; McPherson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 03 at 8:49PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Thunderstorms with strong gusty winds will impact portions of northeastern Arthur, eastern Grant, southwestern Hooker and northwestern McPherson Counties through 915 PM CDT/815 PM MDT/... At 849 PM CDT/749 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms with strong gusty winds extending from 6 miles east of Hyannis to 13 miles northwest of Arthur. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Arthur, Swan Lake, Carr Lake, Duluth, Lena, Sand Puddin Lake, Cogill Lake, Calora, East Cody Lake, Jensen Lake, Green Lake, Sand Beach Lake, Three Mile Lake, Velma, Pratt Lake, Spring Valley Lake and Bucktail. This includes the following highways... Highway 2 between mile markers 149 and 158. Highway 61 between mile markers 121 and 146, and between mile markers 150 and 155. Highway 92 between mile markers 165 and 179. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
